I’m Verena Michelitsch, an independent designer and art director, originally from Austria, based in New York City.
I specialize in conceptualizing and creating visual expressions spanning graphic design, art- and creative direction, illustration, editorial– and digital design. I’ve had the pleasure of working with an array of international clients including Apple, Nasa/JPL, Facebook, Bottega Veneta and The Smithsonian. I'm the co-creative director of Gossamer magazine, a bi-annual lifestyle print magazine about Cannabis and creative director of the Gossamer brand. 

I’m Verena Michelitsch, an independent designer and art director, originally from Austria, based in New York City. I specialize in conceptualizing and creating visual expressions spanning graphic design, art- and creative direction, illustration, editorial– and digital design. I’ve had the pleasure of working with an array of international clients including Apple, Nasa/JPL, Facebook, Bottega Veneta and The Smithsonian. I'm the co-creative director of Gossamer magazine, a bi-annual lifestyle print magazine about Cannabis and creative director of the Gossamer brand. 

Over the past years I have established an international network of developers, type designers, brand strategists, animators, editors, producers and writers who I regularly collaborate with on large scale projects.
